concept_data.title: undertaking for collective investment in transferable securities

summary: The term "undertaking for collective investment in transferable securities" (UCITS) refers to a specific type of investment fund regulated under EU law, designed to facilitate the pooling of capital from multiple investors for investment in transferable securities. UCITS funds are characterized by their stringent regulatory framework, which ensures investor protection and promotes market integrity. These funds are widely recognized across the EU, allowing for cross-border marketing and distribution. The term "UCITS fund" serves as the preferred designation, encapsulating the essence of these collective investment vehicles, which are pivotal in enhancing the accessibility of financial markets to retail investors.
